sections.heading: Action by seizing creditor who has been compelled to reimburse purchaserThe seizing creditor may recover from his judgment debtor whatever he has had to pay to the purchaser who has been evicted
sections.text: Action by seizing creditor who has been compelled to reimburse purchaserThe seizing creditor may recover from his judgment debtor whatever he has had to pay to the purchaser who has been evicted.
